title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2023, Check Final Results
postname: General Duty Constable (BSF, CRPF, CISF, SSB, ITBP, AR, SSF)
description: The SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2023, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC) under Advt. No. GD-2022, offered a significant opportunity for candidates aspiring to join Central Armed Police Forces (CAPFs), including BSF, CRPF, CISF, SSB, ITBP, AR, and SSF, as General Duty Constables. This recruitment drive filled 50,187 vacancies for Constable (GD) posts, open to candidates aged 18–23 years with a 10th-pass qualification. The application window was from November 24, 2022, to December 31, 2022 via the official SSC website (ssc.nic.in). The Computer-Based Test (CBT) was held from January 10 to February 14, 2023, with results declared on April 8, 2023. The Physical Efficiency Test (PET)/Physical Standard Test (PST) occurred in May–June 2023, followed by the Medical Examination in July–August 2023. The final result was announced on August 20, 2023. The selection process included CBT, PET/PST, Medical Examination, and Document Verification. With a pay scale of ₹21,700–₹69,100 (Level 3), SSC GD Constable 2023 is a top choice for Sarkari Naukri aspirants seeking government jobs in security forces. Check results and scorecards at ssc.nic.in.

title: SSC MTS / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
